name: Arms Dealer (itch)
description:
You play an Arms Dealer who is hired by the local Merchant to supply a nearby village with weapons. Sell every villager a weapon and move to the next village. Try to rack up the biggest sales and the most profit by talking to each villager to find out their likes and dislikes when it comes to weapons. 

This game is entirely playable by mouse. 

Left Click NPCs to interact with them. 
Move the Camera by placing your mouse at the edge of the screen.
